entries.title: Flying soon? Flighty is a must-have iOS app for air travel
entries.description: If you're flying anytime soon and have an iPhone, Flighty's near real-time alerts, which give an abundance of information and live activities support, make it a must-have.

entries.title: How to get started with Mastodon
entries.description: Now that Twitter is under new (and controversial) management, a decentralized open-source alternative has seen surprising growth. Here's how the Fediverse works and how you can get started.

entries.title: CES 2023 preview: 4 big questions that will shape the week
entries.description: This year's technology Super Bowl will be an event more like 2019, but can it convince us that 100,000 of us still need to gather in person?
